title: Beyond the ordinary: exploring the synergistic effect of iodine and nickel doping in cobalt hydroxide for superior energy storage applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16661-16677
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01907E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sheraz Yousaf, Sonia Zulfiqar, Muhammad Usman Khalid, Muhammad Farooq Warsi, Imran Shakir, Muhammad Shahid, Iqbal Ahmad, Eric. W. Cochran
This study explores the iodine and nickel-doped cobalt hydroxide (I & Ni-co-doped-Co(OH)2) as a potential material for energy storage and conversion applications owing to its excellent electrochemical characteristics.
